          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz smeri vektorjev hitrosti in pospeška</string>
            <string language="en">The Direction of Velocity and Acceleration Vectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Richtung Geschwindigkeit und Beschleunigung

            <string language="x-mt-fr">La direction des vecteurs de vitesse et

            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sentido de vetores da velocidade e do

            <string language="x-mt-it">Il senso dei vettori di accelerazione e di 
velocità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατεύθυνση των διανυσμάτων ταχύτητας και ταχύτητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La dirección de los vectores de la velocidad y 
de la aceleración</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracija gibanja žogice za golf in pripadajočih vektorjev hitrosti in pospeška.</string>
            <string language="en">Motion of golf ball and its velocity and acceleration vectors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vektor hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">velocity vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vektor pospeška</string>
            <string language="en">acceleration vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinematika</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Golfkugel und seiner Geschwindigkeit
und Beschleunigung Vektoren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement de boule de golf et de ses vecteurs de 
vitesse et d'accélération.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento da esfera de golf e dos seus vetores da
velocidade e do acceleration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento della sfera di golf e dei relativi

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση της σφαίρας γκολφ και των διανυσμάτων του 
ταχύτητας και ταχύτητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de la pelota de golf y de sus vectores
de la velocidad y de la aceleración.</string>
